Heboh Anggaran Lem Aibon, Sri Mulyani Akan Temui Tito Karnavian
01 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Caesar Akbar, Dewi Rina Cahyani
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati ikut berkomentar soal heboh anggaran lem aibon yang mencapai Rp 82,8 miliar dalam Rancangan Anggaran Pendapatan dan Belanja Daerah DKI Jakarta 2020. Ia mengatakan akan membicarakan persoalan APBD tersebut dengan Kementerian Dalam Negeri.
"Kami akan bekerja sama dengan Kementerian Dalam Negeri untuk meningkatkan kualitas dari APBD tentunyam dan berbagai hal nanti akan kami koordinasikan bersama," ujar dia di Kantor Kementerian Keuangan, Jakarta, Jumat, 1 November 2019.
Rencana anggaran lem aibon pertama kali terungkap ke publik melalui cuitan Anggota Fraksi Partai Solidaritas Indonesia (PSI) DPRD DKI William Aditya Sarana melalui akun media sosial Twitter.
"Ditemukan anggaran aneh pembelian lem aibon 82 milliar lebih oleh Dinas Pendidikan. Ternyata Dinas Pendidikan mensuplai dua kaleng lem aibon per murid setiap bulannya. Buat apa?" tulis akun @willsarana, 29 Oktober 2019.
Dikutip dari laman apbd.jakarta.go.id pagu anggaran itu diusulkan oleh Suku Dinas Pendidikan Wilayah 1 Kota Jakarta Barat dengan nama "Penyediaan Biaya Operasional Pendidikan Sekolah Dasar Negeri" senilai Rp 82,8 miliar.
Adapun rincian anggaran sebanyak itu akan digunakan untuk membeli lem aibon bagi 37.500 orang selama 12 bulan dengan harga satuannya Rp 184.000. Penelusuran Tempo, di salah satu kios di Pasar Palmerah harga 1 kaleng lem aibon ukuran 0,1 liter seharga Rp 12 ribu. Adapun untuk ukuran galon, di situs belanja online harga satuannya Rp 192.000.
Setelah menimbulkan keriuhan, Dinas Pendidikan dan Komisi E DPRD akhirnya menghapus anggaran untuk pengadaan lem aibon senilai Rp 82 miliar dalam rapat pembahasan rancangan APBD DKI 2020.
"Ya tadi nol-in karena narasi lem aibon yang digunakan tidak ada," ujar ketua Komisi E Imam Satria di DPRD DKI, Kamis 31 Oktober 2019. Imam mengatakan setelah dihapus Dinas Pendidikan akan menggantikan kegiatan tersebut atau menyesuaikan dengan kegiatan yang diusulkan oleh sekolah.
Sebelumnya, Gubenur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menanggapi soal menyeruaknya sejumlah anggaran janggal dalam rancangan APBD DKI Jakarta 2020. Dia menilai munculnya sejumlah anggaran aneh itu lantaran sistem e-budgeting yang digunakan DKI Jakarta belum cerdas.
Anies menyampaikan bahwa sistem yang digunakan oleh DKI Jakarta masih manual dalam memasukkan dan verifikasi data. Hal itu membuat keteledoran petugas yang memasukkan data tak dapat terkoreksi. Misalnya, menurut dia, dalam anggaran lem aibon oleh Suku Dinas Pendidikan Jakarta Barat dengan nilai Rp 82 miliar.
Anies mengaku sudah pernah mereview secara internal kegiatan-kegiatan dalam rancangan APBD DKI Jakarta dan menemukan anggaran-anggaran yang tidak logis. "Satu satu kami lihat, tim kita review satu satu. dan saya paggil semuanya, saya tunjukan keanehan itu," ujarnya.
CAESAR AKBAR | EKO WAHYUDI | TAUFIQ SIDDIQ

Splashy Aibon Glue Budget, Sri Mulyani Will Meet Tito Karnavian
01 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Caesar Akbar, Dewi Rina Cahyani
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati also commented on the aibon glue uproar that reached Rp 82.8 billion in the 2020 DKI Jakarta Regional Revenue and Expenditure Budget Draft. He said he would discuss the APBD issue with the Ministry of Home Affairs.
"We will work closely with the Ministry of Home Affairs to improve the quality of the APBD, and we will coordinate various matters together," he said at the Ministry of Finance Office, Jakarta, Friday, November 1, 2019.
The budget plan for the Aibon glue was first revealed to the public through the tweet of the Jakarta Solidarity Party (PSI) DPRD Faction Member William Aditya Sarana through the social media account Twitter.
"It was found that a strange budget for purchasing 82 billion more of aibon glue by the Education Office. It turns out that the Education Office supplies two cans of aibon glue per student every month. For what?" write the @willsarana account, 29 October 2019.
Quoted from the page apbd.jakarta.go.id the budget ceiling was proposed by the West Jakarta City Region 1 Education Office with the name "Provision of State Elementary School Education Operational Costs" worth Rp.82.8 billion.
The details of that much budget will be used to buy aibon glue for 37,500 people for 12 months at a unit price of Rp. 184,000. Tempo search, at one of the kiosks in Palmerah Market, the price of 1 can of 0.1 liter aibon glue for Rp 12 thousand. As for the gallon size, on the online shopping site the unit price is Rp 192,000.
After causing a stir, the Education Office and the DPRD E Commission finally removed the budget for the procurement of Rp 82 billion worth of aibon glue in a discussion meeting of the 2020 DKI Regional Budget.
"Yes, this was zero-in because the narrative of the Aibon glue used did not exist," said the head of Commission E Imam Satria in DKI Jakarta DPRD, Thursday, October 31, 2019. Imam said after the Education Office was removed it would replace the activity or adjust it to activities proposed by the school.
Previously, DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan responded to the issue of the emergence of a number of odd budget in the 2020 DKI Jakarta APBD draft. He considered the emergence of a number of strange budgets because the e-budgeting system used by DKI Jakarta was not yet intelligent.
Anies said that the system used by DKI Jakarta was still manual in entering and verifying data. This makes the negligence of officers who enter data cannot be corrected. For example, according to him, in the budget of the Aibon glue by the West Jakarta Education Agency with a value of Rp. 82 billion.
Anies admitted that he had reviewed internally the activities in the DKI Jakarta APBD design and found illogical budgets. "One by one we saw, our team reviewed one by one, and I took all of them, I showed the strangeness," he said.
CAESAR AKBAR | EKO WAHYUDI | SIDDIQ TAUFIQ
